BTFG.CompendiumExporter.Title: Compendium Exporter
BTFG.CompendiumExporter.WarnBabeleActive: Please note that this compendium has already been translated by Babele, so not all source data is accessible once it has been initialized.
BTFG.CompendiumExporter.CustomMappingHin: (first field: key used in the translation file; second field: path to the data in the document)
BTFG.CompendiumExporter.NoExportCustomMa: No custom mapping to export for {pack}!
BTFG.CompendiumExporter.NoImportCustomMa: No mapping to import for {pack} with the file: {file}!
BTFG.CompendiumExporter.UseExistingFileH: Allows you to update an already existing translation file to add only new entries
BTFG.CompendiumExporter.IncludeCustomMap: Include custom mapping in translation files
BTFG.ExporterInstanciator.InvalidCompend: Can not create exporter for the compendium {label}
BTFG.Exporter.PleaseWait: Processing compendium {label}. Please be patient, it can take a while depending on the data present inside.
BTFG.Errors.NoEntriesInFile: No entries in the given file {name}
